question: The solution provides a unique approach to solving the given problem(s).
Requirements are implemented completely according to the requirements without major use cases or experiences missing.
The technical solution is modern and designed with best practices to complement the requirements.
Complete and easy-to-follow documentation is included with the solution.
The solution is scalable for future enhancements.
The code is well-organized and maintainable.
The solution handles edge cases effectively.
The UI/UX is intuitive and user-friendly.
The solution includes comprehensive unit tests.
The solution adheres to security best practices.
